column3: @laanwj Removed references to the blockchain size in this pull.\n
Ok, thanks for updating the size reference\nACK\n

General document notes:
- "takes several days to download" is no longer true as of headers-first
- The reference to the direct blockchain download should be removed.  It is pretty pointless to download the first 170k blocks, these days.
@jgarzik Thanks for your comments. I have now fixed those issues.\n
